| Edit this page View Source

GetTimeoutForOperation(OperationType, int, int, string?)

Calculates an adaptive timeout value for a given database operation based on its type, expected complexity and past execution statistics.

Declaration
public TimeSpan GetTimeoutForOperation(AdaptiveTimeoutManager.OperationType operationType, int recordCount = 1, int complexityScore = 1, string? operationKey = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
AdaptiveTimeoutManager.OperationType operationType

The type of operation to be executed.
int recordCount

Number of records involved, used to scale timeouts for bulk operations.
int complexityScore

A relative complexity score used to adjust the timeout.
string operationKey

Optional key for tracking historical execution statistics.
Returns
Type Description
TimeSpan

The timeout TimeSpan to apply for the operation.
